meanings.definition: Run at full speed over a short distance.
meanings.sent1: She sprints to the finish line in the race.
meanings.sent2: He sprints every morning for exercise.
meanings.sent3: The cheetah sprints past the other animals in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: Time sprints by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The athlete sprints with determination and focus.

meanings.definition: A short race at top speed.
meanings.sent1: The track meet includes a series of sprints.
meanings.sent2: She won the sprint with a powerful burst of speed.
meanings.sent3: The sprint between the tortoise and the hare was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: In the sprint to the finish, she emerged victorious.
meanings.sent5: The sprint requires both speed and endurance.

meanings.definition: A brief, intense effort or burst of activity.
meanings.sent1: He made a sprint to finish his work before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The team put in a sprint to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The sprint to clean the house before guests arrive was comical.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a sprint of inspiration that led to a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The sprint of energy in the room was palpable.
